data.name: Exquisite Ghorpse Story
data.detailed_description:
Sit around the campfire with your friends and assemble a spooky ghost story. Was it an eldritch cult or the living dead causing trouble for the local townsfolk? Did the terror happen in a derelict gas station, or perhaps it was an abandoned carnival? And how did they meet their fate?

A short, lighthearted piece of five minute interactive narrative from Jessica Harvey (Paratopic) and Kylie Backstrom, with music by Lazzie Brown (Paratopic/2019 IGF Excellence in Audio).
data.about_the_game:

A short, lighthearted piece of five minute interactive narrative from Jessica Harvey (Paratopic) and Kylie Backstrom, with music by Lazzie Brown (Paratopic/2019 IGF Excellence in Audio).

Did the terror happen in a derelict gas station, or perhaps it was an abandoned carnival? And how did they meet their fate?
data.supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese
